p: The Robert S. McNamara fellowship award to Dr Clement Meseko for the molecular characterisation of swine influenza virus at IZSVe, Padova Italy. We gratefully acknowledge the authors, originating and submitting laboratories of the sequences from GeneBank and GISAIDâ€™s EpiFlu TM Database included in this manuscript. All submitters of data may be contacted directly via GISAID: www.GISAID.org and GenBank: www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov websites. Drs Giovani Cattoli, Isabella Monne and Alice Fusaro of IZSVe for their invaluable support during and after the RSM-World Bank Fellowship in Italy.
